pkgmetadata.longdescription: # scs_coreThe root of all South Coast Science environmental monitoring applications._Contains library classes only._**Required libraries:** * Third party: AWSIoTPythonSDK, pytz, tzlocal**Branches:**The stable branch of this repository is master. For deployment purposes, use: git clone --branch=master https://github.com/south-coast-science/scs_core.git
